sense.name: (Cause to) become active or aroused.
sense.commentary: Note: if specifically causes waking from sleep, use sense 2.
sense.examples: The police roused them from the couch and forced them from the house. The speaker roused the crowd to action. His ideas roused a nation to confront inequality.

sense.name: (Cause to) become awake or conscious.
sense.examples: Guards roused me from a sound sleep. He was roused by drunken men in the street. Please rouse me at 6AM.
